attrMix.name: mix
attrMix.comment: weight of adjustments applied to the material

attrEmissionMode.name: emission_mode
attrEmissionMode.label: emission mode
attrEmissionMode.comment: how to handle emission input. masked uses mix input, unmasked is mix = 1

attrEmission.name: emission
attrEmission.comment: emissive map to add to material's emission

attrEnableSpecular.name: adjust_specular
attrEnableSpecular.comment: use specular adjustment attrs: specular_set, specular_set_blend, specular_mult

attrEnableRoughness.name: adjust_roughness
attrEnableRoughness.comment: use roughness adjustment attrs: roughness_set, roughness_set_blend, roughness_mult, roughness_remap_{in/out}_{min/max}

attrEnableColor.name: adjust_color
attrEnableColor.comment: use color adjustment attrs: color_hue_shift, color_saturation, color_gain

attrEnablePresence.name: adjust_presence
attrEnablePresence.comment: use presence adjustment attrs: presence_set, presence_set_blend, presence_mult

attrOverrideCastsCaustics.name: casts_caustics
attrOverrideCastsCaustics.label: casts caustics
attrOverrideCastsCaustics.comment: allows you to keep or set casts caustics attribute

attrOverrideThinGeometry.name: thin_geometry
attrOverrideThinGeometry.label: thin geometry
attrOverrideThinGeometry.comment: allows you to keep or set thin geometry attribute

attrDisableDiffuse.name: disable_diffuse
attrDisableDiffuse.comment: when checked, turn off all diffuse from input

attrDisableClearcoat.name: disable_clearcoat
attrDisableClearcoat.comment: when checked, turn off clearcoat from input

attrDisableSpecular.name: disable_specular
attrDisableSpecular.comment: when checked, turn off all specular from input
